content: Just realized this is only a week out! :octopus: I'm trying to figure out my schedule that week. What's the plan for social hours? Are people just going onto gather.town during coffee breaks, or are there designated times before/after? I see a 30 minute social hour on the calendar midday Thu.

We've adjusted the schedule (and provided links on all talks to both the Zoom meeting and gather.town) so that this is hopefully more clear. The plan is to go to gather.town during the scheduled coffee breaks (now renamed to "social time"). We've also tried to add in a few more slots for this.
